purpose: Showcase Titanverse AI Agents Quick Actions feature through product feature visual, demonstrating how AI Agents execute actions (prescription generation, sending to pharmacy, email sending) rather than just providing advice.
core_message: Not just advice. Real execution. AI Agents in a pharmacy, getting things done.
summary: Single image product feature visual showcasing Titanverse AI Agents Quick Actions capability. Demonstrates AI Agents executing actions (prescription generated, sent to pharmacy, emails sent) rather than just providing advice, positioning AI Agents as execution tool for pharmacy operations.
